# startVoiceChat(withParticipantID:)

**Instance Method**

Sends a request to another participant to join the voice chat.

## Declaration

```swift
func startVoiceChat(withParticipantID participantID: String!) throws
```

## Parameters

- **participantID**: A string that uniquely identifies the participant to connect to.

## Discussion

The voice chat service calls the client’s [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKVoiceChatClient/voiceChatService(_:send:toParticipantID:)] method to send the connection request to the remote participant.
